dimensions: Warp x Weft: 283 x 92 cm (9 ft. 3 7/16 in. x 36 1/4 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton, linen
Technique: plain weave
description: Hand-woven length designed for a jacket with a subtle horizontal stripe and slubbed surface.  The warp is of black cotton used in pairs.  Each weft is a group of three yarns: one blue, one white, and one red.  The irregularity of the hand-spun white yarn creates slubs on the surface.
name: Textile
